title: Promising Covid-19 Pill Licensed to U.N.-Backed Nonprofit to Increase Global Supplies
sub_head: Merck is licensing molnupiravir to a group that will pick drugmakers to make the pill for low- and middle-income countries
body:
Merck & Co. will license a promising Covid-19 drug to a United Nations-backed nonprofit to provide more supplies to low- and middle-income countries.
The Medicines Patent Pool, which aims to expand poor countriesâ€™ access to drugs, will work with multiple drugmakers to produce molnupiravir for 105 nations, including Pakistan, Cambodia and all of Africa, the company and nonprofit said Wednesday.
